abstract.p: Southeast Toyota Distributors in Deerfield Beach, Fla, owned and operated by JM Family Enterprises, has narrowed review for its consolidated advertising account to four finalists; spending is estimated at $70 million (S)

block.p: Southeast Toyota Distributors in Deerfield Beach, Fla., owned and operated by JM Family Enterprises, said yesterday that it had narrowed a review for its consolidated account to four finalists. Spending was estimated at $70 million.

The finalists are Gotham in New York, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies; the New York office of Grey Worldwide, part of the Grey Global Group; Omni Automotive in Birmingham, Ala., part of the Intermark Group; and West Wayne in Atlanta.

Southeast Toyota Distributors in Deerfield Beach, Fla., owned and operated by JM Family Enterprises, said yesterday that it had narrowed a review for its consolidated account to four finalists. Spending was estimated at $70 million.

The finalists are Gotham in New York, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies; the New York office of Grey Worldwide, part of the Grey Global Group; Omni Automotive in Birmingham, Ala., part of the Intermark Group; and West Wayne in Atlanta.

Two agencies were eliminated from the review: Della Femina Rothschild Jeary & Partners in New York, owned by top managers and the Omnicom Group; and the Fort Lauderdale, Fla., office of Saatchi & Saatchi. A decision is expected in mid-September.
